text:
Hi Andreas,

Thank you for using our bug submit page.

Tomcat appears to trigger this failure.  Could you ask jakarta to
investigate this issue further, please?  The developers at jakarta will
be able to examine their product, isolate the cause of the behavior, and,
if necessary, provide us with a detailed report.
  There is a jakarta
bug reporting site at http://jakarta.apache.org/site/bugs.html.
   

Regards,
Nathanael
----------------- Original Bug Report-------------------

category : java
release : 1.4.1
subcategory : classes_lang
type : bug

text:
If the VM crashes, this is a VM bug, not a Tomcat bug (although a VM bug could
be triggered by a Tomcat bug, of course). Please only reopen the report if you
can pinpoint a Tomcat bug.
creator: remm@apache.org
